questions.onset: When did the chest pain start? Was it sudden or gradual?
questions.radiation: Does the pain spread to your arm, jaw, neck, or back?
questions.severity: On a scale of 1-10, how severe is the pain?
questions.associated_symptoms: Are you experiencing shortness of breath, sweating, nausea, or dizziness?
questions.duration: How long has the pain been lasting?
questions.character: How would you describe the pain? (crushing, squeezing, sharp, burning)

triage_rules.expression: 'sudden' in str(onset).lower() and ('yes' in str(radiation).lower() or 'arm' in str(radiation).lower() or 'jaw' in str(radiation).lower()) and ('breath' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'sweat' in str(associated_symptoms).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Possible Acute Coronary Syndrome (ACS) - Immediate Emergency Care Required

triage_rules.expression: 'sudden' in str(onset).lower() and ('yes' in str(radiation).lower() or 'arm' in str(radiation).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Sudden chest pain with radiation - Possible cardiac event - Emergency evaluation needed

triage_rules.expression: str(severity) and int(severity) >= 7 and ('yes' in str(radiation).lower() or 'arm' in str(radiation).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Severe chest pain with radiation - Emergency evaluation needed

triage_rules.expression: ('breath' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'sweat' in str(associated_symptoms).lower()) and ('yes' in str(radiation).lower() or 'arm' in str(radiation).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Chest pain with cardiac symptoms - Urgent evaluation needed
Moderate chest pain - Medical evaluation recommended
